title: [Discussion] 2nd year engr. student, but want to prepare for CFA level 1.
content: I am a second year engineering student and I want to get into finance field. I am planning to prepare for CFA level 1, targetting august 2026(acc to updated eligiblity criteria). Is there any senior who has done SMTH like this or maybe I need some kind of reality  check as well if this is a good option or not. Please guide me in the right direction fam.

comments.body: What's ur priority? Ca or eng ... Like if u need just pass mark in eng ok ... U can do ca
